from collections import Counter

def analyze_chef_contributions(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['']
        contributions = case['contributions']
        contribution_counts = Counter(contributions)
        unique_shades = sorted(contribution_counts.keys())
        green_shades = [f'{shade}: {contribution_counts[shade]}' for shade in unique_shades]
        results.append({'green_shades': green_shades})
    return results

def analyze_chef_contributions(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['N']
        contributions = case['contributions']
        contribution_counts = Counter(contributions)

    return results

    results = []

        N = case['N']
